arts.ttl: PSG vs Atalanta – The Italian squad: 4 absentees, Lookman left out
arts.sum: This Wednesday, Paris Saint-Germain and Atalanta will face off at the Parc des Princes in the first matchday of the 2025-2026 Champions League (kick-off at 9 p.m., CET). Here is the squad called up by coach Ivan Juric for this match. Out – Bakker, Ederson, Kolasinac, Scamacca (Injury), Lookman (choice).
